desc.p: Contains the name of the routine / process to be automatically started when a user or session is begun with a login which is the key to this file.
Contains any details relevant to the AUTO.START.PROCESS defined in this record.
In the case of OFS.START.ONLINE.COMMS it will contain the OFS.SOURCE id.
Contains the Unix or NT login name that will automatically begin the process defined in this record.
These records are created automatically from OFS.SOURCE when a login is specified.
